mapper.update: UPDATE takeaway SET memo=#{memo}, takeaway=#{takeaway}, updated=now() WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(o.COUNT* p.product_price) AS total, tn.id AS turnover_id, tn.discount, tn.checkout, tn.payment, ta.memo, ta.takeaway, ta.created, ta.id FROM `order` o, product p, turnover tn, takeaway ta WHERE ta.created BETWEEN CURDATE() AND DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND tn.takeaway_id = ta.id AND o.turnover_id = tn.id AND o.product_id = p.id GROUP BY ta.id ORDER BY ta.created DESC ;
SELECT tor.id as turnover_id, tor.checkout, tor.takeaway_id, tor.discount, tor.payment ta.created,ta.memo,ta.takeaway,ta.id FROM takeaway ta, turnover tor WHERE ta.id=tor.takeaway_id AND ta.id=#{id};
